title: Ou Bien Encore
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian-friendly canteen and gallery with stylish ambiance. Sources products from local farmers and markets. Has a large choice of vegan and gluten-free options marked on the menu. Tartines, salads, smoothies. desserts. Lots of seating. In each quarter an artist living in western Switzerland has their art on display.
